description:
## Objective 
Make share button clickable .

## Steps
1. Install mifos-mobile-cn android app in your phone .
2. On selecting Navigation Drawer , you will find a field "Share" , this is not clickable right now in the application . 
3. **Your task is to make this share button clickable**


## References
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/17167701/how-to-activate-share-button-in-android-app

## How to get help 
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos-mobile-cn).
name: Mifos Mobile CN: Make "Share" Button clickable .
